ComicInfo.Summary: Freedom's Just Another Word for Nothing Left to Lose; (Sanctuary Book Five: The Wolf - Chapter One: Lusiphur interrupts his trial by retrieving his hidden gun and shooting the judge and taking Fleece hostage. Dendrin bursts in and tells everyone Cassy's dead. Lusiphur goes crazy.
